amendment.description: To require appropriate reporting regarding the number of full-time employees for either the Office of Disaster Assistance or the Disaster Cadre of the Small Business Administration, to provide appropriate assistance in the event of a catastrophic national disaster, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2652 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
